original_text: We are telling you the good news that Jesus Christ told to us. This is the message: God is completely good and clean. He is like light. There is nothing dark about him.
korean_text: 우리가 그에게서 듣고 너희에게 전하는 소식은 이것이니 곧 하나님은 빛이시라 그에게는 어둠이 조금도 없으시다는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: We are telling you the good news
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 당신에게 기쁜 소식을 전하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that Jesus Christ told to us
God is completely good and clean
There is nothing dark about him
